About.title: About
About.subtitle: Kryfal
About.description: Experts in Threat Intelligence and digital investigations, protecting companies against advanced cyber threats. Kryfal was born from a realization: sectors forming the backbone of the economy are the most neglected in cyber intelligence. While the market focuses on generic threats, we dive into the specific ecosystems of Agribusiness, Ports, Aerospace, and the new Web3 economy, delivering intelligence managers can use to make strategic decisions and protect their most valuable assets.

Posicionamento.title: Our Positioning
Posicionamento.description: There is no effective threat intelligence without deep business knowledge. Kryfal positions itself at the intersection of cyber expertise and the operational reality of the most critical sectors. Instead of offering generic solutions, we dive into your value chain to understand who the threat actors are, how they think, and how they operate, ensuring business continuity.

brand_protection.title: Corporate Counterintelligence
brand_protection.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.
brand_protection.list_title2: The integrity of your operation depends directly on the robustness of your supply chain — including both external suppliers and internal human capital. Failing to rigorously verify a single link, whether a critical logistics partner or a newly hired executive, can introduce vulnerabilities across your entire structure.
brand_protection.list_title3: Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most damaging risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without prior background checks is managing a business based on an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners’ operational and ethical reality.
listItems: Your company may have access to security feeds and even Deep Web alerts, but how do you connect these dots?
How to translate a technical indicator into a real business risk?
And how to ensure the right person — from SOC analyst to CEO — receives the correct intelligence, in the right format, at the right time to act?
brand_protection.list_description: Information without context is just noise.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Our Deliverables
SectionServiceSecond.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.

card1.title: Precision
card1.description: Third-Party Due Diligence: We thoroughly investigate potential partners, suppliers, or M&A targets. We map corporate structures, reputational and legal history of partners (KYP - Know Your Partner), and identify hidden liabilities or involvement in illicit activities.

card2.title: Expertise
card2.description: Background Check: We perform in-depth checks of candidates and key personnel. We analyze professional history, legal proceedings, digital reputation, and potential conflicts of interest to ensure integrity and reliability.

card3.title: Excellence
card3.description: Fraud Investigation & Response: We investigate suspected fraud, corruption, asset theft, and internal sabotage. We collect structured evidence, identify the involved parties, and provide detailed reports to support administrative and legal actions.

card4.title: Internal Risk Mapping
card4.description: Mapping Internal Risks and Conflicts of Interest: We analyze your employees' ecosystem and connections to identify undeclared relationships with competitors, suspicious side activities, and other risk factors not revealed by traditional audits.
